title: Please nerf Braum.
body: He has basically an Ali ult every 10 seconds.

replies.body: Is the mustache too much for you?

I hate Braum so much, cancer champ that does way to much as a support. His auto should not apply his passive, only his q should that way theirs counterplay before you get stunlocked for half the match.
OP: PLZER NERF RITO PLZZZZZZZZZZZZ MY DMG DIDNT DMG THATS TO OP
You can also take Poppy or Vayne and push them away. Even take Alistair support and knock him back.

What are you talking about? His shield doesn't stop CC or remove it/shorten it in any way. It only ~~destroys~~ intercepts projectiles and reduces damage, reducing in effectiveness for every hit suffered might I add.

How is that anything like an Ali ult?

It doesn't reduce in effectiveness for every hit suffered, it blocks 100% of the first damage then 40% damage reduction for the rest of the 4 seconds his shield up and I was comparing it to Alistars ultimate because it is 70% damage reduction for the duration.

It is basically an Ali ulti aside from the CC removal in that it massively reduces damage however unlike Alistar's ultimate he can cast it every 12 seconds.

That and it only works in one direction. It also goes for a shorter duration than Alistar's ultimate.

Also, sorry about the damage reduction thing. I genuinely thought it reduced in effectiveness for every hit.
nuuu why braum deserves a buff. he needs more love.
u hav to admit that video where the braum blocks an 8000 dmg zed ult is OP as crap

You move the other side of the shield and deal damage.
The point of Braum is to be able to counter Nidalee spears and any other high damage skillshot/spell.

So we're nerfing everything but top laners then?

And no Braum E is nothing like an Alistar ultimate.
It's exactly like an Alistar ulti, absorbs a ridiculous amount of damage but on a massively short cooldown.
